website_summaries.verdict: A handy set of three hammers with steel shot heads for added force and a gentler hold in the hand.
pros: Forceful, yet rebound is minimal to keep damage at a minimum
Set of three brightly colored hammers for a reasonable price
cons: These hammers wouldn't be suitable for all use cases - some heavy-duty jobs might require a stronger tool

customer_reviews.title: Quality dead blow hammers that don't break the bank
customer_reviews.text: Just when I needed a good dead blow hammer, USPS pulled up and handed me the package. Set the 3lb. to use removing 2 rusted brake drums, which was fairly easy using this hammer. Sure I will put all 3 hammers to good use. I recommend them for those like me that not only can't afford the pro tools, but can't justify the expense if we could (I'm a DIY, not a pro).
customer_reviews.author: combatjumpmaster

customer_reviews.title: Great for busting up ukulele bands
customer_reviews.text: When I offered to buy a friend ukuleles for her entire family, she said she’d rather have sledge hammers to make firewood. So, being a good friend, I bought her these. The joke's on me. They love them! Oh well. Just wait till I take up bagpipes.
customer_reviews.author: Peg

customer_reviews.title: Very useful! Big Bang for the Buck!
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes you just have to have a dead-blow hammer. This complete set is cheaper than most single mid-size hammers. I've used the medium and large hammers for several jobs on cars and trucks. Puts force where it's needed without damaging components.
customer_reviews.author: Calvin D. Webster

customer_reviews.title: Great all around vallue for a triple set of dead blow hammers!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because I never seemed to have the right size. Did a wee bit of research and decided on these. They feel good in the hand and they deliver the blow well. Wish I'd done this years ago!
customer_reviews.author: M. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Not to shabby
customer_reviews.text: For the money these have held up well. I have beat with them pretty hard. Very handy to have around.
customer_reviews.author: bill

customer_reviews.title: value buy
customer_reviews.text: my 2nd set, have one at work and i bash on them everyday. works great for the price
customer_reviews.author: Steven Xiong

customer_reviews.title: These are Great!
customer_reviews.text: My husband ordered these, he works as a Glazier and he said he loves these! One of his coworkers asked if we could order his some to! Great value!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Santana

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, seems to be a good set, time will tell
customer_reviews.author: Tina Dillingham

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: For the price cannot beat them, holds up well to abuse. In the shop, on the road, on the truck.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: Like these much better then my old metal one ,, rubber helps keep the lightning from burning my hand
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: these are a great value. and cheap enough that you can destroy ...
customer_reviews.text: for those that use their hammers every day, these are a great value. and cheap enough that you can destroy them and no feel bad. (heavy equipment mechanic)
customer_reviews.author: NickD

customer_reviews.title: Good hammers
customer_reviews.text: Just what my husband needs for that extra thrust when installing flooring.
customer_reviews.author: PC

customer_reviews.title: So far so good quality Manufacturing
customer_reviews.text: So far so good seeing the terrible and does the job
customer_reviews.author: Ralph

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Good set. Have used all 3. Nice feel. They work exactly how they should
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Quick delivery and appear to be high quality product, just as I hoped.
customer_reviews.author: Billy

customer_reviews.title: It’s a hammer
customer_reviews.text: They are hammers. I hit things with them. That seems to work
customer_reviews.author: Pa SENNERT

customer_reviews.title: More useful for most home tasks than traditional hammers
customer_reviews.text: Traditional metal hammers are great for driving the occasional nail, but can do a lot of damage tapping pieces of wood or other materials together or loosening up items for repairs. I find that a dead blow hammer and a screw driver are more useful to have in my home maintenance kit most of the time, except when I'm putting on a new roof! These hammers are well balanced, provide good grip and come in a variety of sizes to handle different situations. I used to use just one larger hammer, but with this group, I've found them even more useful.
customer_reviews.author: PAUL DEBARY

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Hammers
customer_reviews.text: I have several older dead blow hammers that had started to break and fall apart. These replacement dead blow hammers are very well made. I really like the steel shot inside the head which helps prevent rebound.
customer_reviews.author: htg1969

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: Work amazing for getting stubborn corroded wheels off of vehicles.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Vasquez

product_meta.title: WORKPRO Dead Blow Hammer Set 3-piece 1, 2 and 3 Lbs
feature_bullets: Steel shot-filled head adds extra force to hammer blows and eliminates rebound, helpful in minimizing damage to the struck surface since it controls the striking force with minimal rebound from the striking surface
Suitable for dislodging small parts, installing or removing knock-off hubs, and for popping out small dents
Hi-visibility red color makes hammer easy to locate, textured handle for non-slip grip
The Set includes: 1 Lb Dead Blow Hammer, 2 Lbs Dead Blow Hammer, 3 Lbs Dead Blow Hammer

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars78 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
